dcterms:creator: Joao Carreira
Eric Noland
Andras Banki-Horvath
Chloe Hillier
Andrew Zisserman
dcterms:description: Kinetics-600 is a complex dataset of natural videos consisting of 600 classes with at least 600 videos per class, totaling around 500,000 videos. It is designed for human action recognition and is characterized by its diversity and unconstrained nature, allowing for the training of large models without overfitting concerns.
dcterms:title: Kinetics-600

dcterms:creator: Khurram Soomro
Amir Roshan Zamir
Mubarak Shah
dcterms:description: UCF-101 is a dataset of 13,320 videos of human actions across 101 classes, previously used for video synthesis and prediction tasks. It is smaller and less diverse compared to Kinetics-600.
dcterms:title: UCF-101

dcterms:creator: Frederik Ebert
Chelsea Finn
Alex X Lee
Sergey Levine
dcterms:description: The BAIR Robot Pushing Dataset consists of stationary videos of a robot arm moving around a set of changing objects, used for future video prediction tasks.
dcterms:title: BAIR Robot Pushing Dataset
